data.title: Very Tasty Once You Understand the Menu
data.text:
If you would like to try some new and delicious Asian food, check out Hanabi. Once you figure out the menu, you're sure to get something really tasty. I wanted hot, cooked food, and our server was very knowledgeable about the menu and patiently answered all my questions. 

We had vegetable teriyaki, scallop hibachi, vegetable fried rice, and spicy chicken hibachi. Meals run from $12-18 and their presentation is also lovely. The steamed rice is perfect. Our vegan ordered edamame, miso soup, and seaweed salad for dinner. 

There is happy hour from about 3:00-5:30 where you'll find good food prices. The spring rolls were $3. 

We also tried a plum wine flight and sake for the first time. I didn't like them, but you might! There's a full bar and lots of drink options. One weird thing was the head-banging music track going during dinner, but it wasn't too loud. Park on the street.

data.title: Nice food & nice ambiance
data.text: We're visiting Duluth for our 6 year anniversary and decided to come here for dinner last night. It's a nice place with a nice ambiance. The food was good too. Happy Hour was still a little pricey for sushi but expected for this area (I suppose). Overall a good experience.

data.title: Great meal!
data.text: I think this was our favorite meal while visiting Duluth.  We did not have any sushi, but had the noodles, steak and fried rice.  The whole family loved it.

data.title: Great food!!
data.text: I went there for dinner, the service was great the waitress (Stephine)was very kind she made my dinner experience great. I had the kin a (I think that is what it was called) sushi  rolls and chicken fried rice (best I have ever had).  The atmosphere was awesome. 100% recommend Hanan I  will be back for sure.

data.title: Love the Yum Yum sauce!
data.text: We love their sushi, their fried rice and the yum yum sauce.  It is not very big, but we have always been able to get in.

data.title: First timer
data.text: Tried sushi for the first time.   The staff was very helpful deciding what to try. Food was great.   I got a California roll and asparagus roll,  the boyfriend got No.9 and something spicy.  It was all very good.  Love the environment. You wouldn't expect it from the outside.

data.title: Wow! Sushi!!
data.text: Such a cute cool place great food and I am not crazy about sushi they have plenty of non sushi options for those friends of yours who are picky eaters! Must stop in!!!

data.title: Best sushi in Duluth!
data.text: I love going here! The atmosphere is amazing. The whole place is slightly dim and very nice. The food is great and really fun if you want to try something new. Everybody has to try it!

data.title: Delicious and fresh sushi!
data.text:
We went to Hanabi based on a recommendation from a chef. It did not disappoint! They have a full bar, great happy hour and lunch prices, and plenty of options for those that don't enjoy sushi as much as some others do. (Ahemmm...my fiance says he could eat 10 rolls. I stop at 2.) The bartender is very laid back and no-nonsense.
We will definitely revisit Hanabi!

data.title: Duluth visit
data.text: I went here for lunch with my wife and four year old child. Sushi was good, really liked my poison spider roll(soft shell crab). Lunch plates were a very good value. Service was very good. Only issue we had was they didn't have certain items on the menu we wanted to order. Not really kid friendly as there was no booster seats or anything for children.

data.title: Always a great meal!
data.text: Love this place, the rolls, sushi, and dinners are so good.  The fried rice is made to order and so fresh and delicious!  The best fried rice in Duluth.  The atmosphere is nice as well.  The food presentation is beautiful too.  Don't miss out, check this place out.

data.title: Quality menu!
data.text: Very good and quality sushi! Nice and dark atmosphere- great for a date night. The salmon sashimi was mouth watering! Food presentation is very appealing.

data.title: Best Sushi
data.text:
We always leave saying, "this is still the best sushi I've ever had!" 
If you love sushi, you'll love the food at Hanabi!

data.title: Very good quality and selection
data.text: Plenty of the usual choices of appetizers sushi sashimi rolls tempura. All good quality. Good beer selection. Reasonable prices. Everyone enjoyed their food definite recommend. Don't let the tarp covered window on the outside throw you off

data.title: Perfect, top quality Japanese Cuisine
data.text: The restaurant has wonderful lighting, great waiters, and fabulous sushi rolls. The place has good service, and I enjoyed how great the service was on getting the orders fast, making it quickly, and having our food in front of us, pronto. Just a really great place overall.

data.title: Don't miss this place a bit up the hill -- notable Japanese food in Duluth!
data.text: We've been three times in the past year, and meals were pleasant and tasty.  Fine sushi, memorable green tea, and friendly staff.  If you are wondering "sushi in Duluth" don't think twice: as good as Fuji-Ya in the Twin Cities (if not quite to "Origami" . . .)  Large bar attracts a non-dining clientele, but that's fine to have a bit of liveliness.

data.title: Simply Outstanding
data.text: Top quality sushi served in a comfortable contemporary restaurant that has a bar area and a seating area.  Great for dine in or carry out.  A real gem.

data.title: Lunch prior to New Year's Eve with friends
data.text:
I just love the quality of food and very pleasing plating that is truly artwork.
We were in and out quickly as we were in before the lunch crowd arrived.
The flavors are terrific and the freshness of ingredients top shelf.

data.title: Best Happy Hour in town
data.text: Hanabi is THE place to meet for happy hour.. Fantastic food and beverages at amazing prices.   My favorites are Chicken Yakatori and Gyoza... With a house Merlot.   Generally speedy and amazing

data.title: Great Find
data.text: Very good for our family. The kids aren't big sushi fans but they enjoy the experience and the staff was very attentive and prompt. We've no sushi experts but we always enjoy stopping here when we are in Duluth and have never had a bad experience. The happy hour specials are great too.
